title: It Kills me that people are still on their phones when they're in front of customer service
body:
Whether its at a fast food, walmart, whatever; these people are still using their phones when they're at the front of the line even though there's a sign that says "please don't be on your goddamn phone when you're at the customer service desk." 

You can't get off your phone for two fuckin' minutes? C'mon.
